channel.title: Compile error
channel.description:
[code]src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1364: error: not a statement c.gfx0391; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
Please help..

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @koomar koomar
item.description:
@koomar wrote:

I have. I was following a tutorial and pasted it where it said to paste it, resulting in those errors.

This guide to be exact. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520563.0.html

Read full topic

@deathschaos9 wrote:

Make sure you’ve pasted that code in the correct area of the class.

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Most of the errors come from variable ‘c’ not existing.

The remaining errors are thrown because the method forceAnim(int) doesn’t exist in NPC class.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error

item.description:

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1344: error: cannot find symbol int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1352: error: cannot find symbol npcs[i].forceAnim(6986);//barrage? ^ symbol: method forceAnim(int) location: class NPC src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1354: error: cannot find symbol if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1355: error: cannot find symbol c.freezeTimer = 15; ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1356: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(369); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1357: error: cannot find symbol c.sendMessage("You have been frozen."); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1363: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().appendPoison(160); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1364: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(391); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1366: error: cannot find symbol c.sendMessage("Nomad fills you lungs with a deathly smoke."); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1371: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(382); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1373: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1374: error: cannot find symbol c.sendMessage("You're encased a unholy shadow."); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1380: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(377); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1381: error: cannot find symbol c.sendMessage("Nomad Saps your health d increases his own.");
